definition: the activity of putting an item or items in a package
details:
noun
- the activity of putting an item or items in a package
= example: the activity of putting an item or items in a package
- material used to make packages
= example: material used to make packages
- a message issued in behalf of some product or cause or idea or person or institution
= example: a message issued in behalf of some product or cause or idea or person or institution
= synonyms: promotion
